subject: Greetings And Happy New Year 2
body:
Greetings And Happy New Year 2024
How are you doing today? please for goodness sake why have you decided
to abandon your Consignment Box worth US$6.8 Million here for period
of time now this consignment has been here in my Custody without
hearing from you, tell me why have you decided to abandon what
rightfully belong to you all because of the little fee which i know
you can afford? On my last message i stated that every necessary
arrangement to complete your delivery in your door step is taking care
of by United Nation, and 
the IMF has Order us to release all the
beneficiary packages to them once the sum of $100 USD is paid for
United Nation Deliver Permit
, So if you are still interested to
received your package then i will advice that you should kindly get
back to me after reading this message so we can instruct you on how to
send the $100 USD as to enable you get your Cargo Box within the next
24 hours on the receipt of the payment.
THANKS AND REMAIN BLESS IN CHRIST JESUS AS I LOOK FORWARD TO YOUR
URGENT AND IMMEDIATE RESPOND ASAP.
BEST REGARD
DR. SAM WILLIAMS
MESSAGE FROM THE PRO
UNITED NATIONS ORGANIZATION.
Tel: +229) 53861279
Emil ( 
drsamwilliams590@gmail.com
 )

subject: Re: Greetings And Happy New Year 2
body:
Hello Dr. Sam Williams,

Thank you for reaching out to me and wishing me a Happy New Year. I hope you're doing well too. I must admit, your message has caught my attention.

I apologize if it seemed like I abandoned my box worth US Million. It's just that I haven't received any updates or information regarding it, so I wasn't sure what to do next. Can you please provide me with more details about the box and why it has been in your custody?

You mentioned a fee that needs to be paid for the United Nation Deliver Permit. Could you please explain what this fee is for and how much it would cost? I want to make sure I have all the necessary information before proceeding.

Also, could you clarify who exactly instructed you to release the packages to the United Nations once the fee is paid? Is there any way I can verify this information?

I appreciate your assistance and look forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
Richard
